lead_paragraph: KNOCK--Joseph Ray, Esq.,died on January 2, 2016 in Paris, France. He is mourned by his wife, Caroline de Messieres, his daughters, Rachel Marschang and Shanti Knock, their mother, Patricia Knock, and his grandsons Abrahim, Ian and Jad. 1/3
snippet: KNOCK--Joseph Ray, Esq.,died on January 2, 2016 in Paris, France. He is mourned by his wife, Caroline de Messieres, his daughters, Rachel Marschang and Shanti Knock, their mother, Patricia Knock, and his grandsons Abrahim, Ian and Jad. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KNOCK, JOSEPH RAY, ESQ.
